ing: 1/2 (6 ounce) package Canadian-style bacon, chopped, or to taste
1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle beer
des: "Great side dish for about anything. Quick and easy, you can change or add seasonings if desired... but is straight-up good as-is."
ins: Heat oil in a large stockpot over medium heat; cook and stir onion and bacon until fragrant, 2 to 4 minutes. Add cabbage and mix well; pour in beer. Cover stockpot and simmer, stirring occasionally, until cabbage is tender, 10 to 15 minutes.
